page.title: 08LOCAL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Much of the employment in this area is created by self employment. The main type of employment within the area is farming. There are two one man businesses i.e. a garage and a blacksmith. The shop is also a one man establishment. The inn provides work for a chef,waiters,waitresses,barman and domastic. The remainder of the workforce have to travel to find employment. The occupations followed outside the area are :- University/college lectures, police,nursing,catering,motor mechanic banking,school caretaker. There is a large number of retired people in the area. Unemployment is not realy a problem in this area.
